On Search subject:

Read. I wrote on this page, in torrent Description "(for Bookmark/Favorites in your browser)".

Do it. If you decide not to - it looks like one have "different" type of problem, and I can do nothing about.

Clicking afterward on torrent is not so hard. It takes less of time than writing complaints (or "have you uploaded this or that...where is it"), right? Reading - is - unfortunately necessary. In any of the cases. 

If you don't wanna read - it's probably stupidity, plain and simple. And I don't want do anything about.

Use Google. Writing down in Google Search "TV.Shows.Pack" and get lined up all my TV uploads shouldn't be so "hard" either.

Be nice, be smart, be innovative - and - DO NOT WASTE MY TIME, PLEASE. I cannot deal with personal "problems" of yours.
